info.title: mVerify
info.description: mVerify is an Open API, that is an alternative to SMS based One Time Password. It is a hosted, secured, scalable solution for customer phone verification that works without SMS. mVerify brings an innovative approach for customer phone verification as it replaces SMS based onetime password, with an OTP over a missed call ( to mobile, landline phone), thereby eliminating any cost and delay.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: OTP code received on phone in first step
